dublin_core.dcvalue: Boudewijn Peters, Danida Health Sector Program Support, Email:boudewijn.peters@gmail.com | Maryam Hemed, Zanzibar Ministry of Health, Tel: +251927361823, Email: hemed32@yahoo.com

Wired Mothers links pregnant women with their primary health providers thru a mobile phone application. Women receive appointment reminders, educational messaging and direct access to call their primary care providers to discuss non-acute issues.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:20:06Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 wired_mothers.pdf: 234772 bytes, checksum: bc3a3c01b20dfaf56572b2c7f9f225f0 (MD5)
Client education and behavior change communication, Maternal Health, Newborn Health
